title: An actual 1350 IP skin idea.

replies.body:
It would be a legendary skin if it had new voice lines, so 1850.

Other than that, I don't like the concept and would like a different skin to get the legendary treatment for her.

You don't like the concept which is her original lore concept and all that ? Well nice, lets make more anime skins so you can enjoy the concept then! Right? How about sailor moon ahri! Oh wait, we already got it... And no it doesn't make it a legendary, theres' cheaper skins with voice lines. And we're speaking about Kat here, not other champions. Glad we had this talk. Now take that not Katarina skin which is going to get released and enjoy NOT Playing Katarina, just some rip off with her kit. Same goes for the so called previous "skin"

Your concept was basically crimson elite Katarina. I don't like crimson elite skins, they are ugly.

Yes, I would like an anime Katarina skin. Skins should either be lore based (like your suggestion), place them in a different story, or just be a truly novel idea.

I don't dislike lore based skins, but I would rather have one from the other two categories.

And there are only like 2 or 3 skins cheaper than legendary with additional voice lines and either it is just a couple of lines or it sucks.

Just having the lines added to base Kat would be ok, but I would not buy the skin as you proposed it.

Ugly people make clothes ugly. Katarina would look amazing as long her face is shown with her scar and hair. Something her last 2 anime based skins hide.

ps nobody updates voices lines for default apperance cause they cant leech money of it :p

So then by your logic Riven and Talon are both ugly, which I wholeheartedly disagree with. Yes, Katarina would be hot in just about anything, but I would prefer a better looking skin than crimson elite has proven to be in the past.

Also, they updated base Lux's lines. I am hoping to see that made more common. What happened with Lux is that they had the VA in for the ultimate skin so they just recorded some additional lines for base Lux while she was there. If they made Kat a legendary or ultimate skin then they could potentially do the same.

I dont want any more Kat skins cause they just ruin her... The last 2 "Skins" are not even Katarina anymore and look disgusting. 
Yes Riven is ugly for me and a lot of her skins prove me right, as they are plain ugly... Her buddy is "sexy" and "good" only cause the bunny outfit itself looks good on nearly any female... Even Rek Sai would look hot in it... Or Gragas... While Talon just looks like a base male, same as Garen. Both got no attractive lines, except the hunky basic lines which you can see in nearly every male... 

And yet, Crimson Elite is an actual Noxian squad. Which belonged to Katarina's father, so it's logical for her to have a skin where you got the lead after her father's death. There's literally no skin anymore to be made which will make Kat be Kat, except Kat in a bunny suit... but Riot will find a way to make it NOT Kat again. Oh wait... Forgot. Pool Party Skin... Which did not happen, cause clearly Pool Party skins are considered too sexual so they decided to skip them this year. 

So what Katarina skin you suggest, that will make her still be Katarina and not a random ghost or robot borrowing her kit? ^^
The point of a skin is to make the character different. If you don't want that then just don't use a skin.
No its not. A skin is to show the same champion in a new outfit. Just because people like you try to blow the meaning, doesnt mean its true.

Um... all of her skins have her in different outfits (unless you don't count color then mercenary doesnt). Every skin has every champ in a different outfit (unless you don't count colors on a few of them). Outfits make the character different visually.

I don't understand what you want. Is your issue is that some of her skins change her hair color? I mean all of her skins up to this point look like Katarina in different outfits and are pretty cool.

Project and this new thing need her to be dead to be achieved. That's my issue. Plus project has a different face shape the first place. And the new thing has her pre VU hair with physics. That's lazy and lame and killing Katarina's personality and life.

I love all her old skins. The last 2 are trash that's not Kat.

So your issue is that they changed her hair in those skins? I don't think that changing her hair a bit kills her.

I mean, I can instantly tell it is her by seeing the picture. The parts of the face you can see on project look almost exactly the same imo (on the splash art). The hair on her new skin looks fine imo.

Besides, even if that is your issue you still have Warring Kingdoms, Sandstorm, High Command, Kitty Cat, Bilgewater (although that one makes her hair black, so it might kill her for you), and Red Card.

The only issue I have with the new skin is the shape of her blades. I think they should have stuck with a curved dagger shape instead of a two edged arming sword shape. Actually, on second look, I might be fine with it with a smaller/nonexistent cross guard.

who even spoke about the hair? project is a robot based on the original with small pieces of the orignal aka dead. this new one needs you to be dead and your soul to be enslaved by the reaper. Both need death. The hair style is different and hair shorter, while bilgewater is the same as the original just dyed. Learn to read more than 2 words
Those skins are ugly and dumb. Try again. Make something actually nice for her.

Crimson Elite talon is awesome. Riven is bad via default. This skin would look amazing on Kat giving the fact she IS the crimson elite leader, since her father died. But obviously you think the last 2 skins are amazing ,but an actual Katarina skin is horrible, cause it's Katarina, right?

Any skins on Kat is good (even sherwood katarina), because kat is life.
But yea, why the hell isn't this Skin implanted yet !?
Kata is talon's "sister" they are from the same family, so why talon and not Kat ?
Talon is her adopted brother. And Sherwood wouldnt be Katarina.

> [{quoted}](name=Kitty Katarina,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=FbHIaJsT,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-10-11T10:26:54.289+0000)
>
> Talon is her adopted brother. And Sherwood wouldnt be Katarina.

I know ... That's why i said "brother"...
And sherwood katarina was a comparaison i used to tell that i'll buy even the worst skin of katarina, just because it's katarina.

Look. Trust me. I literally live Katarina. Hell most of the community hates me cause of my way of been Katarina and loving Katarina and all... But skins that literally kill who she is or what she is (the last 2 skins), I would never buy, as they would be an offence towards Katarina. So no. Sherwood skin wouldn't make you a bigger fan, it would just make you a sheep that would buy anything Riot throws at you with a tag "katarina", even if it's not Katarina.
So true lol
(click reply so we can know what's true)
By the way, the title says 1350 IP, you meant RP didn't you? :P
IP wont exist in few weeks, so does it really matter if I misspelled it? :p
Well, besides the masturbating garen and talon voicelines... Keep up the good work ;)
Erm... Galio said Garen peed himself... That was what I was reffering to... Good work? :o

> [{quoted}](name=Kitty Katarina,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=FbHIaJsT,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-10-11T11:00:44.279+0000)
>
> Erm... Galio said Garen peed himself... That was what I was reffering to... Good work? :o

Oh my.... LMAO yeah i misunderstood lol
Y_Y
